notes: Added full client search with instant filtering by name, PIB, email, address, city, postal code, and registration number (diacritics-insensitive).
Introduced client list sorting by name, PIB, and email with clean SaaS-style table controls.
Added city-based client filter with reset option for faster navigation in large client lists.
Redesigned Clients page toolbar: search and filters are now placed above the table with a clean, consistent layout.
Fixed client city selection and persistence issues when creating and editing clients (city and postal code now always stay in sync).
Improved city Select behavior for existing clients so the saved city is immediately visible when editing.
Ensured consistent Serbian and English translations for all new search, filter, and reset UI elements.
General UI polish and stability improvements in the Clients module.
